name: Chief Wand
description: This piece is called a "Wandcil" (a pencil with a wand topper). It is a great Halloween party favor to hand out or even to use as a pencil that will make you stand out. Each piece is one of a kind and handmade. Wand Components: - Arizona Arrowhead - #2 Lead Pencil - 9" - Copper Wire - Feather - *Glows in the Dark* - Charged with Light of the Full Moon for questions email wandmakersinc@gmail.com
